cortex.demos.demos_basic package¶

Submodules¶

cortex.demos.demos_basic.classifier module¶

Demo for training a classifier.

Try with python classifier.py classifier_mnist.yaml

cortex.demos.demos_basic.classifier.init_learning_args(learning_rate=0.01, l2_decay=0.0, dropout=0.0, optimizer='rmsprop', optimizer_args={}, learning_rate_schedule=None, batch_size=100, valid_batch_size=100, epochs=100, valid_key='error', valid_sign='+')¶

Default learning args.

This method acts as a filter for kwargs.

Parameters:
  • learning_rate – float.
  • l2_decay – float, L2 decay rate.
  • dropout – float, dropout_rate.
  • optimizer – str, see utils.op
  • optimizer_args – dict, extra kwargs for op.
  • learning_rate_schedule – OrderedDict, schedule for learning rate.
  • batch_size – int
  • valid_batch_size – int
  • epochs – int
  • valid_key – str, key from results to validate model on.
  • valid_sign – str, + or -. If -, then sign is switched at validation. Good for upperbounds.
Returns:

locals().
cortex.demos.demos_basic.classifier.train(out_path=None, name='', model_to_load=None, test_every=None, classifier=None, preprocessing=None, learning_args=None, dataset_args=None)¶

Basic training script.

Parameters:
  • out_path – str, path for output directory.
  • name – str, name of experiment.
  • test_every – int (optional), if not None, test every n epochs instead of every 1 epoch.
  • classifier – dict, kwargs for MLP factory.
  • learning_args – dict or None, see init_learning_args above for options.
  • dataset_args – dict, arguments for Dataset class.

cortex.demos.demos_basic.eval_rbm module¶

Eval script for pretrained RBMs.

cortex.demos.demos_basic.eval_rbm.evaluate(model_to_load=None, center_input=False, dataset_args={}, out_path=None, mode='test', **kwargs)¶

cortex.demos.demos_basic.rbm_mnist module¶

Demo for training RBM with MNIST dataset.

Try with python rbm_mnist.py rbm_mnist.yaml.

cortex.demos.demos_basic.rbm_mnist.init_inference_args(n_chains=10, persistent=False, n_steps=1)¶
cortex.demos.demos_basic.rbm_mnist.init_learning_args(learning_rate=0.0001, optimizer='sgd', optimizer_args=None, learning_rate_schedule=None, batch_size=100, valid_batch_size=100, epochs=100, valid_key='nll', valid_sign='+', excludes=[])¶
cortex.demos.demos_basic.rbm_mnist.train(out_path=None, name='', model_to_load=None, save_images=True, test_every=None, dim_h=None, preprocessing=None, learning_args=None, inference_args=None, dataset_args=None)¶

cortex.demos.demos_basic.vae module¶

Demo for training VAE.

Try with python vae.py vae_mnist.yaml.

cortex.demos.demos_basic.vae.init_learning_args(learning_rate=0.0001, learning_rate_schedule=None, l2_decay=0.0, optimizer='rmsprop', optimizer_args=None, n_posterior_samples=20, reweight=False, batch_size=100, valid_batch_size=100, epochs=100, valid_key='-log p(x)', valid_sign='+', excludes=['gaussian_log_sigma', 'gaussian_mu'])¶
